subtitle: Stick these tasty little bites into half a melon or grapefruit when entertaining friends.

method.text: In a large, shallow, rectangular dish, mix together the tomato ketchup, mustard, honey and parsley. Thread the sausages onto bamboo skewers. Tightly wrap a rasher of bacon around each sausage.
Place the bacon-wrapped sausages in the dish and brush over the sauce mix. Cover and chill overnight.
Preheat the grill to a medium heat.
Remove the kebabs from the dish, brushing over the remaining sauce mix. Grill for 8-10 min, turning frequently or until thoroughly cooked.
Leave the sausages to cool completely before serving on the skewers.

title: Saucy bacon wrapped sausages
